law.catch_line: Manufacture of small quantities not prohibited in dry territory.
law.text: The normal restrictions applicable in dry territory shall not apply to any manufacturer who in good faith and in the usual course of trade sells alcoholic beverages of the manufacturer's own make, at his or her manufactory, in quantities of not less than three (3) gallons delivered at one time for immediate transportation, to a point in some other state, or to a point in this state where alcoholic beverages may be lawfully sold.
law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 121, sec. 29, effective June 25, 2013. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2554c-41.
